__TOC__

* No scheduled meetings this month. Please bring up new business in the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-wi|mailing list]]</nowiki> or the <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-us-wi|irc channel]]</nowiki>.

* Events: Madison Ubuntu Hour is the third Saturday of each month, hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>. This month's was July 16. The next <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1085/detail/|Madison Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> will be 20 Aug.

* We welcome new members. Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-Wisconsin|Launchpad Team]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-wi|mailing list]]</nowiki>, and get involved!
